summary: This is an invoice from ClaimFox, Inc. to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, dated July 8, 2020, for records requested from USAA related to a criminal banking investigation. The invoice details charges for search/procurement fees and pages related to a criminal FED (Federal) case, referencing claimant Ghislaine Maxwell and a claim number.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as the claimant name on the invoice for records requested by the US Attorney's Office related to a criminal banking investigation.

events.title: Invoice Issued for Records Request
events.description: ClaimFox, Inc. issued an invoice to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York for records requested from USAA related to a criminal banking investigation involving Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: Southern District of New York, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York requested criminal banking records from USAA related to Ghislaine Maxwell, as evidenced by an invoice dated July 8, 2020.
Ghislaine Maxwell is listed as the claimant on the invoice, with a claim number 40897182, indicating her direct involvement in the financial records being sought.
The invoice is from ClaimFox, Inc., a records retrieval company, billing for search/procurement fees and pages related to a 'FSB Criminal FED' case.
The document shows ongoing financial investigation activities by federal prosecutors in New York in mid-2020 related to the Epstein/Maxwell case.
